name: Monster Run: Jump or Die
description:
Cute monsters has come to town! Funniest monster tap and run game is here!

Control your monster to run around the cities. Snatch the human and transform them into monsters as well!

The human also put on the resistance. They have prepared the bombs, alleys, cars, tanks, and even helicopters to fight us. Destroy all and transform those human into monsters too.

Monsters are able to transform into Monster Ninja, Monster Dragon, Monster Quarterback, Monster Midas,... and more! Collect coins to unlock these transformation skills. Each monster have different skills. Ninja can slash everything in front of him. Midas can make everything into coins. And Dragon, the ultimate form of monster, can squash everything under his feet! Remember to upgrade monsters skills to get better transformations.

FEATURES
- Cute little adorable monsters
- Eat human *nom nom*
- Monster Ninja
- Monster Dragon!
- 10+ locations around the world
- Tons of daily quests with big rewards!

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap and Jump
- Avoid bombs and obstacles
- Don't drop into the pit!
